thread.title: Ex-members of church where teens beaten talk of decline
thread.title_full: Ex-members of church where teens beaten talk of decline

title: Ex-members of church where teens beaten talk of decline
text: Add a message (optional) Success - Article sent! close Deborah Leonard enters the courtroom for a hearing, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in New Hartford, N.Y. Leonard and her husband have been charged with fatally beating their 19-year-old son inside a church, and four fellow church members have been charged with assault in an attack that also left the young man's brother severely injured. (Tina Russell/Observer-Dispatch via AP, Pool) Associated Press Bruce Leonard enters the courtroom for a hearing, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in New Hartford, N.Y. Leonard and his wife have been charged with fatally beating their 19-year-old son inside a church, and four fellow church members have been charged with assault in an attack that also left the young man's brother severely injured. (Tina Russell/Observer-Dispatch via AP, Pool) Associated Press Daniel Irwin, a member of the Word of Life church, leaves New Hartford Town Court after testifying, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in New Hartford, N.Y. Bruce Leonard and his wife Deborah Leonard have been charged with fatally beating their 19-year-old son inside the church, while four fellow church members who have been charged with assault in an attack that also left the young man's brother severely injured. Associated Press
